info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 10:18PM CDT until April 26 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi...Arkansas...
Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing
For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... Major flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing.
* WHEN...From Tuesday morning to Saturday, April 26.
* IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, Water is beginning to go over Loggerhead Lane going into Bordeaux Camp. Drum Cove is flooding, and Buffalo Drive is mostly covered. The south ends of Ricky Road and Brown Road are flooded, along with the street going out of Nel-Win Camp. Tammy Road and Lloyd Road are flooded. Bee Trail and Plum Road are going underwater. The east part of Sherry Lane is being flooded and Peters Island is almost completely inundated.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday morning to a crest of 38.5 feet Monday, April 14. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, April 25. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY, APRIL 26
